Package com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.controller

Class PaymentController

java.lang.Object
com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.controller.PaymentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasicGetController<Payment>
@RestController @RequestMapping("/payment") public class PaymentController extends Object implements BasicGetController<Payment>
Controller class for handling payment-related operations. Includes methods for making bookings, accepting payments, canceling payments, and retrieving payment information.

    • makeBooking

      @RequestMapping(value="/makeBooking", method=POST) public BaseResponse<Payment> makeBooking(@RequestParam int buyerId, @RequestParam int renterId, @RequestParam int busId, @RequestParam List<String> busSeats, @RequestParam String departureDate)
      Endpoint for making a booking and creating a payment.
      Parameters:
      buyerId - The ID of the buyer's account.
      renterId - The ID of the renter's account.
      busId - The ID of the bus.
      busSeats - The list of booked bus seats.
      departureDate - The timestamp of the departure date.
      Returns:
      A BaseResponse containing information about the success or failure of the operation.

    • accept

      @RequestMapping(value="/{id}/accept", method=POST) public BaseResponse<Payment> accept(@PathVariable int id)
      Endpoint for accepting a payment.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the payment to be accepted.
      Returns:
      A BaseResponse containing information about the success or failure of the operation.

      Parameters:

      A BaseResponse containing information about the success or failure of the operation.

    • getMyPayment

      @GetMapping("/getMyPayment") public List<Payment> getMyPayment(@RequestParam int buyerId)
